programme.title: Live: NHL Hockey
programme.desc: The Montreal Canadiens travel to Sunrise to face the Florida Panthers at Amerant Bank Arena. Brad Marchand has been the veteran engine for the Panthers, leading the team with 20 goals and 20 assists. He celebrates his 1,000th NHL point milestone.

programme.title: Live: Football Night in America
programme.desc: "Football Night in America" features host Maria Taylor, Hall of Fame head coach Tony Dungy, former NFL head coach and quarterback Jason Garrett, former NFL quarterback Chris Simms and NFL insider Mike Florio recapping the day's NFL highlights. Co-host Jac Collinsworth and two-time Super Bowl champion Rodney Harrison contribute on-site each week.

programme.title: Live: NFL Football
programme.desc: The Bears line up against the 49ers on Sunday Night Football. San Francisco flattened Chicago 38-13 in the last meeting in December 2024. George Kittle (SF) turned six catches into 151 yards in that victory. The Bears are 5-3 on the road this season.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: An unstable woman stops taking medication and mows down 10 people with her car; a former rock star wages an anti-psychiatric-drug campaign.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Stabler and Fin investigate the disappearance of two high-school students from a museum field-trip; Stabler meets his new partner.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: A successful preacher (Tim Daly) is the prime suspect in a murder case, until his wife (Kathy Baker) provides detectives with a taped conversation.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Four honor students are arrested for criminally negligent homicide when another student dies at a party that they threw.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: When detective Benson gets into the middle of an investigation of her brother, the case begins to threaten her career.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: When a teenage boy is killed in what appears to be a play fight, the victim's friend claims he filmed the death.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Benson and Stabler investigate the case of a woman (Cynthia Nixon) with multiple personalities who may have abused and killed her daughter; the detectives must adjust to sweeping changes in the SVU.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: When the accused killer of a teen's mother is released due to lack of evidence, the youth exacts his own justice by killing the man.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: When an 8-year-old girl is kidnapped on her way home from school, DNA tests on the blood found in the abductor's abandoned van reveal she has leukemia.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: When a baby boy is discovered in the trash, Benson and Stabler use a bar T-shirt found at the scene to link the crime to a well-to-do college student.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Three cocky prep-school teens are prime suspects when a high-school student from Montreal vanishes during a class trip to New York.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: A runaway bride calls the SVU for help on the day of her wedding; Rollins pitches in on her day off.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: The SVU searches for a pattern assailant before his crimes escalate to murder; Fin must contend with a suspect's aggrieved son; Carisi is pressured to close the case quickly to ease public concern.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: The SVU investigates a brutal attack on a group of law students; Benson hopes the discovery of a hidden camera will crack the case open; Carisi's best chance at conviction is catching the defendant in a lie.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Devastating repressed memories come back to a woman when she finds an old notebook in her family home; bringing charges in a decades-old crime proves even more difficult for Carisi when a powerful judge stalls the case.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: A couple's dinner party ends with a violent home invasion and assault by masked men; Rollins suspects the crime is linked to her Intelligence investigation of an international gang of thieves.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: A romantic date ends with a teenager fighting for her life in the hospital; Carisi can't help bringing the case home with him as he envisions the dangers ahead for his growing daughters.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: When a TV reporter becomes the victim of sextortion that could ruin her career, Benson helps her take back control while Velasco goes undercover as a potential rich target.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Bruno must get to the center of a victim's incomplete story to track down a serial rapist; Carisi is helpless to stop a crime he suspects is about to be committed.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: An abhorrent web of lies and betrayal is uncovered when a woman is confronted with video of a night she can't remember; Carisi struggles to move on from his ordeal when the suspect changes his plea.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: When a teen from a group home goes missing, the squad has only minutes to determine if he ran away or was abducted; Velasco suspects the system at large is to blame for letting children slip through the cracks.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: A young boy seeks help when his sister doesn't come home from work; Benson and Carisi suspect a woman's assault was prearranged by a third party.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: When a high school principal busts a student for sexting, the SVU uncovers a sinister case of distribution concerning hundreds of underage students; Silva pleads for leniency for a suspect she believes is innocent.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Velasco teams up with a community security guard eager to prove his mettle to find a suspect in the assault of two teens.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: A Midwestern tourist is viciously attacked in Times Square; as the squad scours the area for clues, the victim takes the investigation into her own hands; a secret motive threatens to derail Carisi's case.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: A complicated case of sex and drug use divides the squad; Carisi must convince a jury to focus on the law and not the defendant's accusations.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: When a man is ruthlessly assaulted and burned, the SVU's investigation uncovers a decades-old secret; Bruno helps a young witness find the courage to come forward.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: When a car with a young girl in the backseat is stolen, the SVU investigates whether it was a crime of opportunity or a targeted abduction.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: When an assault at gunpoint is witnessed through a neighboring window, the squad scrambles to locate the victim to confirm she's safe; a threat to extort the victim's family leads to a shocking suspect.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Benson investigates a string of sexual assaults targeting local female psychiatrists; the squad celebrates a promotion.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: A runaway bride calls the SVU for help on the day of her wedding; Rollins pitches in on her day off.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: The SVU searches for a pattern assailant before his crimes escalate to murder; Fin must contend with a suspect's aggrieved son; Carisi is pressured to close the case quickly to ease public concern.

programme.title: Dateline
programme.desc: The missing-persons case of 12-year-old Jonelle Matthews in Colorado remains a mystery for more than three decades until detectives narrow in on a suspect whose bizarre behavior after her disappearance hints at something much more sinister.

programme.desc: Voight pursues a suspect against the police commissioner's orders; Halstead puts his career at risk when a case involving a recently released drug dealer turns personal.

programme.desc: When Atwater goes under cover to bring down the longtime head of a criminal enterprise, he becomes entangled in a situation that tests his allegiances as well as his conscience.

programme.desc: Upton and Burgess find themselves in a difficult situation when Intelligence tracks a cache of cop killer machine guns to a local gun show in Wisconsin.
